note:
Hi everyone! I'm Nadia.

I made this account to learn more about what people think of technology. I'm specifically interested in how to make the web better: no cookies on websites unless they're opted in to, no excessive use of JavaScript, no tracking unless it's opted in to, and simpler page layouts with no distractings.

Feel free to mention me. I love responding to people!

Pronouns: she/her
Platform: Mastodon
Location: The U.S.
Favorite Search Engine: Mojeek
Time Zone: EST
